title: Drawing, Design for (Elevation of) Dining Table of Mahogany, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for (Elevation of) Dining Table of Mahogany
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: In graphite, above upper right corner of design, with an arrow painting to table top: "Top 4'.6" diam" to extend to 12'"; in graphite, along bottom of sheet, at center: "DINING TABLE OF MAHOGANY/INCH SCALE"; in graphite, across left edge of design: numerical notation indicating dimension.
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Elevation shows molded top raised on three turned and fluted tapering legs with flute-stops on casters.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for (Elevation of) Dining Table of Mahogany, 1900–05. Graphite on thin, cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-113
